daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include police responding to bomb threats and suspicious packages, the installation of AI cameras by FDNY for fire detection, and a new housing lottery launch, while Mayor Adams endorses Cuomo against Mamdani in the upcoming election.
